title: Winner — MariTHON National Hackathon
description: Led team to build a commercialized SOF event extraction tool using Gen AI. Secure JWT authentication, Google Cloud AI integration, and production deployment.

title: Top 3 — HackTheWinter (Offline Round 2)
description: Reached Top 3 in the offline final round of HackTheWinter. Built CampusIntel Phase 2 — a unified campus intelligence system with AI-powered chat, smart library, and document processing.
